Those eligible for meal service include all students enrolled at LCC School, as well as any children (ages 18 and younger) living in the household.

div.div: Your session will expire in 0 minutes.

p.span: LCC School is offering a modified school lunch service to all interested families, regardless of income and at no cost, throughout the school closure period. Those eligible for meal service include all students enrolled at LCC School, as well as any children (ages 18 and younger) living in the household.
The meal service will begin on Monday, March 23rd and will continue each weekday throughout the school closure period. (Note: No meal service on April 10 and April 13).

Daily meal menus are posted on the school district website for reference. Families with students having food allergies should contact the school to discuss alternate menu options. Note: Milk flavors will vary.
Meals include main entree, vegetable, fruit, and milk.
Delivery of lunches may be anticipated between 11:15 am and 12:30 pm.
Parent/Guardian must complete and submit the Lunch Order Form for EACH meal delivery service day. The link to the Lunch Order Form is available on the school district website.

span.a: CLICK HERE TO PLACE YOUR DAILY LUNCH ORDER

span.strong: ORDERS ARE DUE BY 4:00 PM THE DAY BEFORE SCHEDULED MEAL DELIVERY
span.br: (Example: Submit your lunch order form for meals to be delivered on Monday, prior to 4:00 pm on Sunday.)

p.span: If you prefer to call in your order, please call (402) 256-3133 (Option 4). You may leave a message if there is no answer.
As always, please contact the school with any questions!

div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 08:35 am CDT

div.span: Mostly sunny, with a high near 78. West southwest wind 13 to 17 mph becoming northwest in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 26 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 43. North northeast wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

A chance of showers between 1pm and 4pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms after 4pm. Increasing clouds, with a high near 72. Light and variable wind becoming south 5 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.
